Nash Nissan is committed to bringing you quality New, PreOwned and Demo vehicles. Our vehicles are quality checked and undergo the roadworthiness test prior to delivery of the vehicle. All tradeins are welcome, we pay fair market related prices. Finance is available through all major finance providers and our team will tailor the deal to suit your needs. Nash Nissan is a division of Super Group whereby we are committed to earning your trust and building relationships.

attributes.description: Volvo XC 60 D5 Inscription Version, Onyx Black, Panoramic SunRoof, 21 Inch Black Diamond Cut Alloys, 360 Camera, Active Air Suspension, Heated and Cooling Front Seats, Bowers and Wilkons Sound System, Lounge Pack, Driver Assist Pack, Smash And Grab Fitted Windows, Balance of 5 Year/ 100 000kms Maintenance and Warranty, Finance Can Be Arranged. Excludes administration, delivery, and License Registration Fees. 80 Point Quality Check. Very Neat. Tradeins Accepted. Test drives welcome. Nationwide Delivery. Finance Is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please Come and visit our preowned manager and our business manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylormade deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our bistro. Tradeins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our finance and insurance manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Auto Baltic Midrand.
